name: Data City
description:
Data City is a game about connecting and managing the internet network of a growing city.

Don't let your nodes crash and collect data in the most efficient way.

Remember that Data City is at an early stage, you will find Bugs and temporary Assets!

Want to help us? Fill the feedback form! https://forms.gle/9FkfbUQbuVCQexaq7

DEVELOPED BY:

TINY RAMPAGE TEAM (EVENT HORIZON SCHOOL TURIN, YEAR 3, 2019/2020)

  • Samuele Castello
  • Stefano Rizzo
  • Barbara Sciortino
